thread.title: Denise Mullins
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Denise Mullins

author: Denise Mullins
title: Denise Mullins
text: Skipper made finding a block of rooms at an appropriate facility for my daughter's wedding so much less stressful than doing it the old fashioned way! Of course I did that too, but decided to release my "control freak" and let them do all of the work for me! Constant contact and website dashboard make all of the moving parts visible and provided assurance that things were getting done AND getting done the way I wanted them. So grateful for this service!
